Check and Adjust Gender in GATK Segmentation Data

CheckGender.Rd

Check and Adjust Gender in GATK Segmentation Data

Usage

CheckGender(cov, seg, gender)

Arguments

cov

Coverage data frame

seg

Segmentation data frame

gender

Expected gender (character, "male" or "female")

opt

List of options, must include gender

Value

Modified segmentation seg data frame with gender columns
